      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void attack_collision_check(App app)
      Detect collision between wizard, fireball, gremlin, red gremlin, and slime, and red slime If the distance between fireball and slime (or red slime) is less than 20 pixel, they both disappear If the distance between fireball and gremlin (or red gremlin) is less than 20 pixel Then, fireball is absorbed, gremlin respawns, and if red gremlin's lives is less or equal to 0, it respwans.

    • Method Detail

      • attack_collision_check

        public static void attack_collision_check(App app)
        Detect collision between wizard, fireball, gremlin, red gremlin, and slime, and red slime If the distance between fireball and slime (or red slime) is less than 20 pixel, they both disappear If the distance between fireball and gremlin (or red gremlin) is less than 20 pixel Then, fireball is absorbed, gremlin respawns, and if red gremlin's lives is less or equal to 0, it respwans. If the distance between slime(or red slime) and wizard is less than 20 pixel, slime vapourised, and wizard respawns.
        Parameters:
        app, - update data to app
